ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Free Comic Book Day 2019
ComicInfo.Title: Road to War
ComicInfo.Summary:
The events leading up to the City at War storyline.
The turtle's are rushing Jennika to the hospital.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:07:16. [Issue ID 1959878]
